full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM GYI BSNYEN PA BYA TSUL SBYIN BSREG DANG BCAS PA BEEd'URYA'I 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (CES DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM LHAN GCIG TU SGRUB TSUL SBYIN SREG @016A *, ,DANG BCAS PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES AOR DUS SU NAS AO'U SHIR PI'I SE SAM PA NA THAS KYI LHA KHANG GI LHA MA GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA MKHAN PO RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG RDO RJE DNGUL GYI MAndAL LHA DAR DANG BCAS NAN TAN TU BSKUL BA LA BTREN NAS, RIG PA 'DZIN PA ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS ME LUG LHA BABS DUS CHEN GYI NYIN LEGS BSHAD SGROGS PA'I DGA' TSAL CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG KUN DGAS BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE'O,, ,,)
